intro.title: Terms of Use
intro.text: Welcome to our Terms of Use. Please read them carefully.

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.text: By accessing or using SpaceLogic services, you agree to be bound by these terms. If you do not agree, please do not use our services.

changes.title: 2. Changes to Terms
changes.text: We may update these terms at any time. Changes take effect when posted. Continued use constitutes acceptance.

use.title: 3. Use of Services
use.text: You agree to use our services legally. You must not:
points: Interfere with the proper functioning of the services;

account.title: 4. User Account
account.text: You are responsible for securing your account. Notify us immediately of any unauthorized use.

termination.title: 5. Termination
termination.text: We may suspend or terminate your access for violation of terms or harmful use.

liability.title: 6. Limitation of Liability
liability.text: We are not liable for any direct, indirect, or incidental damages resulting from use of our services.

contact.title: 7. Contact
contact.text: For questions, contact us at: spacelogic.info@gmail.com
